EmailTemplate.subject: CITGO Fueling Offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now is the best time to apply for the CITGO fleet card program!
Get 27¢ off per gallon for 3 months.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Whether your business is large or small, take charge of your fueling expenses with the CITGO fleet card program. For a limited time only, CITGO is offering 27¢ off on EVERY gallon purchased at a CITGO with the CITGO fleet card!
The CITGO fleet card is the perfect way to simplify your vehicle fueling and eliminate hours of paperwork.
- Rebates of 27¢ on every gallon* for the first 3 months
- Enjoy convenient access to nearly 5,500 CITGO locations or ask for our Universal Card and you'll have acceptance at over 90% of all U.S. fueling sites
- Helps prevent unwanted spending with pre-set controls
- 24/7 U.S. based customer services – for you and your drivers
I will be following up with you over the next couple of days. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to speaking with you about the needs of your business.
Don’t wait any longer to start saving 27¢ per gallon on fuel.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*Subject to credit approval. New accounts only. The 6 month promotional period begins on the date your account is opened. Discounts are not applied at the time of purchase – they will appear as an account credit on your monthly billing statement. Must apply by Dec 31, 2018. Standard rebates of up to 5¢ per gallon of fuel will be applied after the promotional offer. Rebates are subjected to change at any time without prior notice.
